comments.raw_text:
Hovering the Reload button inside the Location bar highlight the down arrow next to it.

STEPS TO REPRODUCE
1. start Firefox
2. move the mouse over the combined Reload/Stop button in the Location bar

ACTUAL RESULTS
The down arrow to the left of it changes color from black to light blue.

EXPECTED RESULTS
Only the Reload button should highlight, not the down arrow, because it's distracting.
Highlighting the down arrow signals to me that some kind of menu will be presented
if I click, which is not the case for the Reload button.
